product_name: Wilderness Press Trails of the Angeles: 100 Hikes in the San Gabriels - 9th Edition - Guidebook with Map
long_description: The updated edition of Trails of the Angeles: 100 Hikes in the San Gabriels offers a variety of hikes in the San Gabriel Mountains near Los Angeles and includes a color fold-out topo map.
short_description: The updated edition of Trails of the Angeles: 100 Hikes in the San Gabriels offers a variety of hikes in the San Gabriel Mountains near Los Angeles and includes a color fold-out topo map.
